name: test_e2e_with_logs[050_XSS_REFL_015]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_015` |
| **Name** | data: protocol injection |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<object data="data:text/html,<script>alert(1)</script>">`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cobject%20data%3D%22data%3Atext%2Fhtml%2C%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~13000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:59:05.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_REFL_015-1765465145903-ykymbp pattern_id=XSS_REFL_015 uri=/?q=%3Cobject%20data%3D%22data%3Atext%2Fhtml%2C%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E%22%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
